name: SIG Web Devlopment
description: In SIG web we get you up and running in the most creative and ever growing field of devlopment. Providing knowledge of HTML, CSS, JS, GIT and building a base for frameworks like React and Angular.

name: SIG Competitive
description: In SIG competitive We help  you  excel  in  procedural  programing  and  problem  solving  abilities  by  enhancing  your  knowledge  in  DataStructures  And  Alogorithms.
syllabus: Linear Data Structures - Arrays, Stack , Queues, Linked List
Algorithms (Sliding window, Kadene's, Moore's Voting alog)

name: SIG Flutter
description: Flutter is a brand new way of creating fast and list apps for both android and IOS using one single language DART, in this SIG we help you harness this skill .

name: SIG C and Data Structures
description: In SIG C & DS we teach you the basics of C programming language and also the Basics of data structure that is elementary to learn anythin in programing.

name: SIG Python
description: In SIG python we teach you about Python a versitalie and really popular scripting based programing Language

name: SIG Java
description: In SIG Java we teach you the essence of  java Language and help you grow as a Java developer from Basics to Advance
syllabus: Intsalling Java and setting up JVM
Operators and Conditional statement in Java
Recursive function , function overloading and overriding
Formal and actual Parameters, swapping elements and values
